item.description:
Look's like a standing invitation from Alex and Tumeria!
Plan to arrive at 3:00 and we can choose a DVD to watch from the list below.
DVD will start about 3:30 and following we’ll have a vegan potluck.
What to bring: A vegan entrée or appetizer (or beverage!) If you are stuck for a recipe there are a ton of great websites to check out. Here are a few: www.tryveg.com,www.theppk.com,www.chooseveg.com.

Parking: Park along side of Mill St., which is at the end of Pine St.
My cell phone # is 508-361-7978, just incase you need it.
See you there!

Here’s the list:
Mad Cowboy- the documentary
Eating
Future Of Food
Peaceable Kingdom
The Witness
What The Bleep Do We Know
A Sacred Duty
Chew On This- PETA
Earthlings
Year Of The Dog
I Am An Animal
King Corn
Behind The Mask
Super-Size Me
Meet Your Meat
Sicko
item.name: DVD and Potluck
